chongqing.metro: Extensive metro network, Line 10 covers airport and city center. Fares: 2-7 CNY (~$0.30-1 USD)
chongqing.taxi_didi: Taxis readily available, starting fare ~10 CNY. Didi app works well. English support limited.
chongqing.payment: Alipay, WeChat Pay, or cash. Metro accepts transport cards.
chongqing.notes: Hilly city, metro most reliable. Taxis may refuse short trips during peak hours.

bazhong.bus: Local bus network, K26 main line to train station. Fares: 1-2 CNY (~$0.15-0.30 USD)
bazhong.taxi_didi: Taxis available, short trips 10-20 CNY. Didi less common than tier-1 cities.
bazhong.notes: Small city, family may provide transport. Taxis easy to hail near train station.

chengdu.metro: Modern metro network, Lines 18/19 serve airports. Fares: 2-10 CNY (~$0.30-1.40 USD)
chengdu.taxi_didi: Abundant taxis and Didi. Starting fare ~8 CNY. Traffic can be heavy.
chengdu.payment: Alipay, WeChat Pay widely accepted. Metro accepts transport cards.
chengdu.notes: Home base allows flexible planning. Metro efficient for panda base and airport.

shanghai.metro: World-class metro system, 20+ lines. Line 2 serves Pudong Airport. Fares: 3-9 CNY (~$0.40-1.25 USD)
shanghai.taxi_didi: Taxis everywhere, starting fare ~14 CNY. Didi highly efficient.
shanghai.payment: Alipay, WeChat Pay, metro cards, some accept foreign cards.
shanghai.notes: Metro fastest for most trips. Hotel near Nanjing Road very walkable to attractions.

beijing.metro: Extensive network, Daxing Airport Line new. Fares: 3-9 CNY (~$0.40-1.25 USD)
beijing.taxi_didi: Taxis plentiful, starting fare ~13 CNY. Didi very reliable.
beijing.payment: Alipay, WeChat Pay standard. Foreign card support improving.
beijing.notes: Daxing Airport far from city (46 km), metro 60-90 min, taxi 60-80 min. Plan extra time.
